about.transformProduct: Transform your digital product into a sales success
about.companyDescription: 1% World connects your company to a global network of qualified sellers, ready to scale your sales with proven strategies and cutting-edge technology.
about.monetizeKnowledge: Monetize your knowledge and reach by selling the best products
about.sellersDescription: Join the elite community of 1% World sellers and get access to the best digital products, exclusive training, and attractive commissions.
about.ecosystemDescription: 1% World is more than a platform, it's a complete ecosystem that combines technology and sales strategies to create an environment where companies and global sellers thrive together. Our mission is to transform the digital products market, offering innovative solutions that generate extraordinary results for everyone involved.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about 1% World.

questions.question: What is 1% World?
questions.answer: 1% World is a complete ecosystem that connects companies and global sellers, offering cutting-edge technology and sales strategies to maximize results in the digital products market.

questions.question: How does it work for companies?
questions.answer: Companies can register their digital products on the platform, set up affiliate programs, and have access to a global network of qualified sellers, as well as tools and strategies to scale their business.

questions.question: How does it work for sellers?
questions.answer: Sellers can register as affiliates, choose quality products to promote, receive exclusive training, and earn attractive commissions for each sale made.

questions.question: What are the cores of 1% World?
questions.answer: 1% World has two main cores: the Technology Core, focused on innovation and technological solutions, and the Sales Core, specialized in strategies and mentoring to maximize results.

questions.question: How do I join the community?
questions.answer: You can register on the platform as a company or seller, and also participate in the WhatsApp groups specific to each core, where we share exclusive content and opportunities.

questions.question: What types of products can I sell or register?
questions.answer: The platform focuses on digital products such as courses, e-books, mentoring, software, subscriptions, and other content that can be delivered digitally.

footer.description: Transforming the digital products market with innovative technology and high-performance sales strategies.
